suppress.notes: False Positives CVE-2022-1471 - SnakeYaml's Constructor() class does not restrict types which can be instantiated during deserialization, spring uses SafeConstructor which is the recommended workaround CVE-2023-35116 - Not believed to be a valid vulnerability - see https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-databind/issues/3972

Temporary Suppressions CVE-2023-36052 CVE-2023-36414 - Still flagged despite azure-identity-extensions dependency constraint CVE-2023-36415 - Still flagged despite azure-identity-extensions dependency constraint
